thread.section_title: eTurboNews (eTN) - Original and unique global international news with a focus on travel and tourism
thread.title: United reports August 2015 operational performance

author: eTN Global Editor
title: United reports August 2015 operational performance
text:
United reports August 2015 operational performance   
Sep 09, 2015 eTN   
CHICAGO, IL – United Airlines (UAL) today reported August 2015 operational results. 
UAL’s August 2015 consolidated traffic (revenue passenger miles) increased 1.5 percent and consolidated capacity (available seat miles) increased 2.3 percent versus August 2014. UAL’s August 2015 consolidated load factor decreased 0.7 points compared to August 2014. 
United Airlines and United Express operate an average of nearly 5,000 flights a day to 362 airports across six continents. In 2014, United and United Express operated nearly two million flights carrying 138 million customers.
